About Exchange Exchange to Exchange
Exchange service Send Receive Exchange rate (estimated) Start Exchange Selected combination is not supported Selected exchange is unavailable
The exchange service is swapping one cryptocurrency to another. A variety of exchange services are available within the application. Select the exchange service provider along with the coins you\'d like to swap.\n\nPlease follow the on-screen instru—Åtions to perform the exchange.\n\nYou can top the wallet up with crypto you already own or by exchanging the coins belonging to a different blockchain. When swapping, make sure the exchanged amount is bigger than the minimum limit.
About Notify: In Guarda Decent wallet, you are able to use two types of wallet addresses either your E-mail or the Encrypted alternative address to manage your DCT coins.

When placing an order, Coinify will create an account for you associated to this email address.

Sending to the node Awaiting confirmation Fail Syncing
Sell You sell You get New order The order confirmation will be sent to your e-mail address. Coinify will send you an e-mail with payment instructions and terms of processing - Please read it carefully - If you agree to them, make a bank transfer to the following account to complete the order. Remember to insert the reference (%s) as the bank transfer text. Without the reference we can not process your trade. \n\nBank transfers must come from a bank account in your own name. Transfers from third party accounts will be rejected. Minimum sell: Maximum sell: Exchange fee: Exchange rate: Accept Coinify‚Äôs Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. Add bank account New bank account Bank name: Account holder: Account currency: Account number: Add international bank account Add danish bank account Add bank account Your purchase of %s %s for %s %s is waiting for transaction confirmation. I accept that cryptocurrency will be traded at the current available exchange rate at the time Coinify processes my order which might differ from the rate displayed above. I am aware of the risks involved with digital currencies and accept Coinify terms and conditions. Amount less than minimum Unfortunately, we cannot process trade order %s. Due to security regulations, the reason cannot be disclosed. In case your card has been charged, an automatic refund has been issued for your order but please be aware that it may take a few more days for the funds to show in your bank account. You can still buy cryptocurrency by using our Bank transfer option. If the transaction is made within 15 min, Coinify will send a bank transfer within 2 bank days to a bank account in your name provided that all details are correct and complete. This sell cryptocurrency option is subjected to AML and Compliance checks.\n\nThis means that you might be requested to provide a proof source of founds/cryptocurrency before Coinify can send you a payout.\n\nBut do not worry, your fiat payout amount will be guaranteed. Learn more about this at Remember that you can only use a bank account registered in your own name to receive the payout.\n\nThe bank account selected needs to have the same currency on the Sell Order. On the contrary, conversation fees might apply.\n\nIt is your responsibility to check with your bank if they receive transfers from cryptocurrency companies. I‚Äôd like to get %s. Provide the automatic exchange and send funds to my wallet. In-app exchange Coinify service provides BTC purchase only. To receive BTC after the purchase you need to provide a destination BTC wallet address. You are not able to manage you BTC within this wallet app, you may use Guarda Bitcoin Wallet or any other wallet available on the market.\n\nGuarda may provide an automatic exchange from BTC to the chosen currency within the current wallet. (You will purchase BTC and receive the amount converted into chosen currency)
Your node must be HTTPS in order to connect.
